title: Kamala Harris' Husband Says He's Never Won A Debate Against Her
content: Ahead of the highly-anticipated first Presidential debate next week, Kamala Harris' husband, Doug Emhoff, spoke about their debates as a married couple in a new interview with 'Pod Save America'.
summary: Ahead of the highly-anticipated first Presidential debate next week, Kamala Harris' husband, Doug Emhoff, spoke about their debates as a married couple in a new interview with 'Pod Save America'.

title: Study Explains How Traffic Noise, Pollution Are Linked To Infertility
content: Roughly one in six people are affected by infertility worldwide. And with more than half the worlds population now living in urban areas, researchers are interested in whether living in noisy and polluted cities could be to blame.
summary: Roughly one in six people are affected by infertility worldwide. And with more than half the worlds population now living in urban areas, researchers are interested in whether living in noisy and polluted cities could be to blame.

title: US Teen Shooter's Mother Was Arrested Regularly, Locked Him Out Of Home
content: The 14-year-old Georgia boy who opened fire at a classroom in his school, killing two students and two teachers, was raised in a troubled home, family and neighbours have said.
summary: The 14-year-old Georgia boy who opened fire at a classroom in his school, killing two students and two teachers, was raised in a troubled home, family and neighbours have said.

title: Selena Gomez, 32, Is Now A Billionaire. Her Net Worth Is...
content: American actress, singer and entrepreneur Selena Gomez is now a billionaire, according to Bloomberg, which values her net worth at $1.3 billion.
summary: American actress, singer and entrepreneur Selena Gomez is now a billionaire, according to Bloomberg, which values her net worth at $1.3 billion.

title: Cat Rescuers Cause Three-Vehicle Crash In US, Fail To Catch Kitten
content: Two animal lovers who stopped on a US freeway to rescue a stranded kitten caused a three-vehicle crash -- and then lost the cat they were trying to help.
summary: Two animal lovers who stopped on a US freeway to rescue a stranded kitten caused a three-vehicle crash -- and then lost the cat they were trying to help.

title: Boeing's Troubled Starliner Leaves Space Station Without Its Astronauts
content: Boeing's beleaguered Starliner left the International Space Station (ISS) on Friday, bound for Earth without the astronauts who rode up on the spaceship after NASA deemed the risk too great.
summary: Boeing's beleaguered Starliner left the International Space Station (ISS) on Friday, bound for Earth without the astronauts who rode up on the spaceship after NASA deemed the risk too great.

title: Pak National Arrested From Canada For Plotting Terrorist Attack In New York
content: The 20-year-old arrested accused, Muhammad Shahzeb Khan, allegedly planned a terrorist attack in New York City around October 7.
summary: The 20-year-old arrested accused, Muhammad Shahzeb Khan, allegedly planned a terrorist attack in New York City around October 7.

title: Turkish-American Woman "Shot In The Head" After Israeli Forces Open Fire
content: A Turkish-American woman was shot dead Friday while demonstrating against Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank town of Beita, where the army acknowledged opening fire.
summary: A Turkish-American woman was shot dead Friday while demonstrating against Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank town of Beita, where the army acknowledged opening fire.

title: He Is "Very Pro-India": Hindu Group Endorses Trump Over Kamala Harris
content: Hindus for America First has announced it will endorse Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and launch a campaign against Democratic nominee Kamala Harris in the key battleground states of Pennsylvania, Georgia and North Carolina.
summary: Hindus for America First has announced it will endorse Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and launch a campaign against Democratic nominee Kamala Harris in the key battleground states of Pennsylvania, Georgia and North Carolina.

title: Pak Wants Peaceful Relations With All Its Neighbours, Says Shehbaz Sharif
content: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday said that his country desired peace with all neighbours, asserting that progress and peace are "intertwined".
summary: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday said that his country desired peace with all neighbours, asserting that progress and peace are "intertwined".

title: Russia Has No Timetable For Ending Special Operation In Ukraine: Kremlin
content: Russia will continue its special military operation until all objectives are achieved and there is currently no set deadline for when it will end, said Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov.
summary: Russia will continue its special military operation until all objectives are achieved and there is currently no set deadline for when it will end, said Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov.

title: US Sees Potential Iran Transfer Of Missiles To Russia As Alarming
content: Any Iranian transfer of ballistic missiles to Russia would mark a sharp escalation in the Ukraine war, the United States said on Friday, following reports that the two countries had deepened ties in recent weeks with such an arms transfer.
summary: Any Iranian transfer of ballistic missiles to Russia would mark a sharp escalation in the Ukraine war, the United States said on Friday, following reports that the two countries had deepened ties in recent weeks with such an arms transfer.

title: Pakistani Man Arrested In Canada For Plotting Terror Attack On Jews In US
content: A Pakistani man living in Canada has been arrested on charges of plotting to carry out an attack on Jews in New York City, the US Justice Department said Friday.
summary: A Pakistani man living in Canada has been arrested on charges of plotting to carry out an attack on Jews in New York City, the US Justice Department said Friday.

title: Ukraine Shoots Down 27 Russian Drones
content: Ukraine shot down 27 out of 44 Shahed-131 and Shahed-136 drones launched by Russia overnight, the Ukrainian Air Force said.
summary: Ukraine shot down 27 out of 44 Shahed-131 and Shahed-136 drones launched by Russia overnight, the Ukrainian Air Force said.

title: "Did Nothing Wrong": Trump Welcomes New York Sentencing Delay
content: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday welcomed a delay in his New York hush money fraud case that pushed sentencing on his 34 felony convictions until after the election.
summary: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday welcomed a delay in his New York hush money fraud case that pushed sentencing on his 34 felony convictions until after the election.

title: Speed Of Nepal Plane In July Crash Didn't Match Guidelines, Finds Probe
content: The small passenger plane involved in a crash that killed 18 people in Nepal in July was carrying a load and travelling at a speed that did not match guidelines at the time of the accident, a government-led investigation team said.
summary: The small passenger plane involved in a crash that killed 18 people in Nepal in July was carrying a load and travelling at a speed that did not match guidelines at the time of the accident, a government-led investigation team said.

title: French Mass Rape Suspect Among "Worst Sexual Criminals," Says Daughter
content: The daughter of a Frenchman on trial for enlisting strangers to rape his drugged wife Friday described him as "likely one of the worst sexual criminals in past 20 years".
summary: The daughter of a Frenchman on trial for enlisting strangers to rape his drugged wife Friday described him as "likely one of the worst sexual criminals in past 20 years".

title: Israeli Strikes Kill 27 Palestinians In Gaza As Polio Vaccination Resumes
content: Israeli military strikes killed at least 27 Palestinians across the Gaza Strip on Friday, medics said, as health officials resumed vaccination of tens of thousands more children in the enclave against polio.
summary: Israeli military strikes killed at least 27 Palestinians across the Gaza Strip on Friday, medics said, as health officials resumed vaccination of tens of thousands more children in the enclave against polio.

title: New York Judge Delays Donald Trump Hush Money Sentencing Until After Polls
content: The New York judge who presided over Donald Trump's hush money trial on Friday delayed sentencing until after November's US presidential election.
summary: The New York judge who presided over Donald Trump's hush money trial on Friday delayed sentencing until after November's US presidential election.

title: 17 Boys Killed, 70 Missing After Fire Breaks Out In Kenya School Dorm
content: At least 17 young boys were killed and 70 missing after a fire ripped through a primary school dormitory in central Kenya, officials said Friday, leaving distraught relatives desperate for news of their loved ones.
summary: At least 17 young boys were killed and 70 missing after a fire ripped through a primary school dormitory in central Kenya, officials said Friday, leaving distraught relatives desperate for news of their loved ones.
